attributes.action: scrap road pricing & Big Brother tatics - instead keeping fuel duty as currently used
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Road pricing is an excessive, Big Brother means to an environmental end.

Taxing vehicles at point-of-purchase according to fuel efficiency and similarly through fuel duty, as is currently done, is perfectly effective in providing clear incentives to use cleaner cars.

It just needs to be used properly.

Watching where everyone drives through an incredibly expensive surveillance system is not. Scrap this - spend the money saved on public transport instead.
